content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
   sum(cast(dockcount as int)), landmark
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://nju2udec24mydlg2.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/raw/babs/201508_station_data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]
group by landmark
